app_descript:
App Name: Documents Scanner

Brief: Documents Scanner transforms your mobile device into a powerful scanning tool, allowing you to create PDF files from photos and documents instantly. Whether you are looking to scan receipts, reports, or business cards, this app provides a plethora of features such as offline PDF generation, smart document detection, and OCR (Optical Character Recognition) capabilities. It's designed to be user-friendly, efficient, and versatile, addressing all your document digitization needs.
